data.persona: I am funny. I like to entertain people. I work in a royal court.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The soldier and the knight are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I want the knight and the soldier to laugh, and I want them to recognize me as a worthy jester
data.long_motivation: I want the king to recognize me as worthy, so that I can be promoted to a better position

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get orders from king to follow knight and soldier

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow knight and soldier to knife seller

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go king to report my trip
